ygData.subject: SV: [Holy Swords]
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe it comes from lower guk, rare drop and stuff.. Stats are like, damage 25 delay 40, AND it has permanent effect haste, which cuts down delay by 25%,
ygData.messageBody:
I believe it comes from lower guk, rare drop and stuff.. Stats are like, damage 25 delay 40, AND it has permanent effect haste, which cuts down delay by 25%, so the delay is really 30.. 25/30.. DROOL!

Also after fear plane opened up, and those two damage 30 weapons appeared.. One WAR and one for SK, I am wondering, is Fiery Avenger supposed to be the paladin equivalent of these weapons? And if so, where can it be found, I also heard there is a ranger claw in fear plane with similar stats as the other two weapons, so only paladin of the hybrids need a similar weapon now.. But as Hate Plane and Air Plane will open, maybe we will find our weapon in any of those planes?

- Avron Akizuki - Knight of Truth - Solusek Ro

From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 11:38 PM
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] [Holy Swords]


> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>

>
> Kananek Dwarven Paladin

> >

> joined up with a level 45 shaman.. It was a fun ride.. ;)
> >
> >Now I am gonna take a bath.. bye..
> >
> >- Avron Akizuki(former Elselynn, now married;)
